content:
Only ocpn_draw seems to be able to draw lines. I have tried to use the "RenderSegment" function from ocpn_draw without success in Android. Windows is ok.
This is important for several of my plugins - otcurrent, frcurrents, otidalplan.
Could someone come up with some lines of code that will draw a line with Android for testing in an OpenCPN plugin?
This topic was moved here from #general > Android - Drawing lines with a plugin by Mike Rossiter.
frcurrents_pi can now draw Android arrows. Thanks Jon G.
Tony Voss has marked this topic as unresolved.
